events.comment: Hit Test. This uses Can Move to test if there's a character on the tile

Movement Attack! NOTE: This is moved down BELOW because GDevelop does not support handling cases on itself. Enemies is here a reference to a specific instance, but I cannot handle behaviours from this object towards other Enemies. Creating another object group does not work either. Note: I was trying to implement enemy movement attacks, where if the movement target is occupied, the enemy will hit the target, which includes all Enemies and the Player. But I cannot handle a single Enemies object to other Enemies case
BELOW is PART 2 for each states
Bear Trap. Disable Movement before it predicts movement
Check if player is just beside the enemy
Prepare for next movement using Pathfinder, refer to "Running Behaviours"
